backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with types for song submissions, metadata, statuses, presave links, and editing workflows.
backend/migration.mo: Adds an isVerified field to artist profiles by migrating old artist profile records to the new schema.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of numerous frontend files including components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents a deployment failure fix, configuration setup, actor initialization updates, and restoration of draft song‑submission features.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring the root element, favicon, viewport, and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, authentication handling, actor initialization, and conditional profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AdminAnnouncemen: Empty component file placeholder for an admin announcements section.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Displays and filters artist profiles, with options to edit or delete them using admin actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Dialog for editing an artist profile, supporting photo uploads, form fields, and profile updates.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditSubmiss: Dialog for editing a song submission, including metadata, artwork and audio uploads, and album track handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminMonthlyList: Allows admins to view and update monthly listener stats for songs, including adding and validating entries.
frontend/src/components/AdminPodcastSubm: Manages podcast show and episode submissions, providing approval, rejection, live marking, and file downloads.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin interface to view, sort, update, and manage song submissions, including status changes, remarks, live URL handling, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/AdminSupportRequ: Empty placeholder component for managing support requests.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Allows admins to generate and copy team invite codes, showing unused codes and creation dates.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserRoleMan: Empty placeholder component for managing user roles.
frontend/src/components/AdminVerificatio: Displays verification requests, lets admins approve, reject, or extend verification, and highlights pending counts.
Empty placeholder component for verification management.
Empty placeholder component for viewing verification requests.
frontend/src/components/AlbumTracksEdito: UI for adding, editing, and removing album tracks, including audio upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ArtistNameWithVe: Shows an artist name with either a verified or green badge based on verification status.
Form for creating or editing an artist profile, including photo upload and social/media links.
frontend/src/components/ClaimYouTubeCopy: Empty placeholder component for YouTube copyright claims.
frontend/src/components/ConnectInstagram: Empty placeholder component for Instagram profile linking.
frontend/src/components/DashboardPublish: Empty placeholder component for listing published blogs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with copyright text and support email link.
frontend/src/components/GeneralSupportTa: Empty placeholder component for general support UI.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Displays a small green badge icon with tooltip, indicating an artist status.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with theme toggle, auth controls, and artist profile display using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PodcastEpisodeFo: Form for creating podcast episodes with file uploads, metadata fields, and progress tracking.
Form to create a podcast show including metadata selection and artwork upload.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Simple modal prompting the user to save their display name via profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SongSubmissionFo: Comprehensive song submission form handling metadata, artist assignment, file uploads, and artwork validation.
frontend/src/components/UserAnalysisPane: Displays analytics for the user's live songs, including listener stats or placeholders when none exist.
frontend/src/components/UserArtistProfil: Manages display, creation, editing, and deletion of a user's artist profiles with dialogs and profile cards.
frontend/src/components/UserEditSubmissi: Dialog for editing song submissions, handling metadata updates, file uploads, and artist selection.
frontend/src/components/UserPodcastSubmi: Interface for managing podcast shows and episodes, including viewing, creating, and loading related items.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Displays the user's song submissions with status badges and supports opening an edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/VerificationBene: Shows benefits of becoming a verified artist and provides an option to apply for verification.
frontend/src/components/VerificationRene: Displays renewal UI for expired verified artist status and allows resubmitting for verification.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadge.ts: Renders a verified badge image with tooltip support in multiple size options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting, editing, fetching, and administering song and podcast data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders admin-only tabs for managing artists, submissions, podcasts, verification, and listener stats with access control.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with login flow and conditional navigation to admin or user dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/ThankYouPage.tsx: Displays a confirmation message after submission with a button to return to the user dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: Implements a tabbed user dashboard with sections for profiles, submissions, podcasts, verification info, and analytics.
Provides a helper to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a file download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File or Blob into an ExternalBlob, optionally attaching upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/isValidUrl.ts: Checks whether a string is a non-empty URL starting with http or https.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s purpose, feature requirements, verification workflow, and asset rules.
